```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(rgdal)
library(sp)
library(gapminder)
library(gstat)
```




```{r}
pollution<-read_csv("annual_conc_by_monitor_2018.csv")
```
```{r}
leaflet(data = pollution)%>% 
  addTiles()%>%
  addCircleMarkers()
              
```


```{r}
pollution_filtered_states<-pollution%>%filter(`State Name`=="Arkansas"| `State Name`=="Tennessee" | `State Name`=="Louisiana" | `State Name`=="Oklahoma" | `State Name`== "Texas" )
```

```{r}
pollution_filtered_states_by_parametres<-pollution_filtered_states%>%filter(`Parameter Name`=="Nitrogen dioxide (NO2)"| `Parameter Name`=="Ozone" | `Parameter Name`=="PM2.5 Total Atmospheric"& `Sample Duration`=="24-HR BLK AVG")

```


```{r}
no2<-pollution_filtered_states%>%filter(`Parameter Name`=="Nitrogen dioxide (NO2)")

```
```{r}
ozone<-pollution_filtered_states%>%filter(`Parameter Name`=="Ozone")

```
```{r}
pm25<-pollution_filtered_states%>%filter(`Parameter Name`=="PM2.5 Total Atmospheric"& `Sample Duration`=="24-HR BLK AVG")
```

```{r}
data(no2)
glimpse(no2) 
```
